name.en: Satellite Oceanographic Data Processing and Analysis
name.ch: 海洋衛星資料處理與分析

department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班
department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences

goal.ch: 讓學生了解現有的海洋衛星資料，其優缺點以及如可應用在學生的研究上。
goal.en: “Introduce currently advanced satellite oceanographic data to students, let them understand advantages and limitations about the data, and how to apply those data into their research.“

outline.ch:
“1. Introduction: Brief introduction of the course and datasets.
2. Sea Surface Temperature (SST): Infrared (AVHRR) and microwave (TMI and AMSR-E) data
3. Surface wind vectors: Scatterometer (QuikSCAT, ASCAT)
4. Active microwave remote sensing, satellite altimetry: TOPEX/Poseidon; AVISO, eddies, geostrophic current, ocean thermal structure.
5. Precipitation: Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission
6. Ocean colour: SeaWiFS, chlorophyll
7. Sea Surface Salinity (SSS)
8. Equivalent water thickness (GRACE)
9. Argo floats“

textbook.ch:
“1. Satellite Meteorology: An Introduction, 1995 Academic Press by S.Q. Kidder and T.H. Vonder Haar
2. Physical Principles of Remote Sensing, 2nd Edition, 2001, Cambridge University Press, by W.G. Rees
3. An Introduction to Ocean Remote Sensing, 2004, Cambridge University Press by Selye Martin
4. Atmospheric radiation, 2001, by K. N. Liou
5. Satellite altimetry and earth sciences: A handbook of techniques and applications, 2001, by L.-L. Fu ＆ A. Cazenave.
6. Picot, K. Case, S. Desai, and P. Vincent, AVISO and PODAAC User Handbook. IGRDR and GRD Jason Products. France: CNES, 2003. SMM-MU-M5-OP-13184-CN (AVISO), JPL D-21352 (PODAAC), NASA, USA.
7. http://www.remss.com/
8. https://www.aviso.altimetry.fr/en/my-aviso.html“
